title: Rajputana Polki Jhumka: A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: South Sea Pearl. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Jhumka features intricate Polki diamond setting, hand-cut Burmese rubies and a delicate South Sea pearl drop. The floral motif at the top seamlessly transitions into the classic bell-shaped jhumka. The base is adorned with ruby drops for a captivating sway.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or half-saree functions. Can also be styled for upscale modern gatherings.
description: Authentic South Indian craftsmanship combined with Rajputana Polki detailing. The high-quality materials ensure durability and enduring beauty. This jhumka embodies the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and will be a cherished heirloom for generations. The uncut Polki diamonds offer a unique, raw brilliance that stands apart from modern cut diamonds.
